import React from 'react' function Cart({cartItems ,incrementQ,decrementQ}) { return (
{ cartItems && cartItems.map(item=>( )) }
# Image Name Quantity Price Subtotal
{item.id} {item.name} incrementQ(item)} style={{cursor:'pointer'}} className="bi bi-caret-up"> {item.quantity} decrementQ(item)} style={{cursor:'pointer'}} className="bi bi-caret-down"> $ {item.price} $ {item.price *item.quantity}
Total ${ cartItems.reduce((acc,item)=> acc+=item.price * item.quantity,0) }
) } export default Cart
